an9.43:4.1: “‘Kāyasakkhī, kāyasakkhī’ti, āvuso, vuccati.
an9.43:4.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā”ti?
an9.43:5.3: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:5.4: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena. (1)
an9.43:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā … pe …
an9.43:6.5: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:6.6: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena.
an9.43:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.43:7.2: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:7.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena … pe ….
an9.43:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.43:8.2: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:8.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti. (9)
